movie_title: How green is your money? ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: When we keep our money in a bank, it is invested to fund other businesses, some of which are far fro

vocabulary.example: She was naive to believe everything he said.

vocabulary.definition: a specialized segment of the market for a particular kind of product or service
vocabulary.example: The company focuses on serving a niche market of vegan customers.

vocabulary.definition: the practice of making an unsubstantiated or misleading claim about the environmental benefits of a product, service, or company
vocabulary.example: The company was accused of greenwashing by exaggerating its eco-friendly initiatives.

vocabulary.definition: the quality of being open and honest, without hidden secrets
vocabulary.example: The organization promotes transparency by sharing detailed reports of its activities.
The documentary put the spotlight on the harsh living conditions in the city.

vocabulary.definition: a comfortable or suitable position in life or employment
vocabulary.example: After years of hard work, she finally found her niche in the fashion industry.
